RuleDetails.Rules:
Admin Fee IRR 750,000 Apply For Refund / Change Per Ticket
Refund: After 21 Working Days

NOTE - THE FOLLOWING TEXT IS INFORMATIONAL AND NOT
VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
WY FARES FOR VFR AGENTS FROM UNITED KINGDOM TO MIDDLE
EAST
APPLICATION
AREA
THESE FARES APPLY
FROM LON
TO AREA 2.
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR FIRST/BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS
SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/SINGLE OPEN-JAW/DOUBLE
OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE.
EXCEPTION-
FARES MAY BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UPGRADING FROM
A LOWER FARE PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THESE
FARES ARE MET
-------------------------------------------------
FARES MAY NOT BE USED TO ESTABLISH A MTP
FOR IT OR FLY-DRIVE PACKAGES.
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS
CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY
THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE
AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS,
WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN
FLIGHT, WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIER'S BEST
JUDGEMENT.
OTHER CONDITIONS
PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED.
NO ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS APPLY.
NO DAY/TIME TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS APPLY.

PERMITTED 31DEC THROUGH 26MAR OR 08APR THROUGH 14JUL
OR 11AUG THROUGH 09DEC ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL
SECTOR. SEASON IS BASED ON DATE OF ORIGIN.

THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
LO FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 9999.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY WY FLIGHT
9B FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999
9B FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 3999
9B FLIGHTS 0 THROUGH 999
ANY LO FLIGHT
ANY SK FLIGHT.

FARE RULE
CONFIRMED RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION
CODE -RBD-.
-----------------
IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
-------------------------
IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING
SECTORS.
--------------------------------
GENERAL RULE - APPLY UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
TICKETING DEADLINES BASED ON DATE OF RESERVATIONS
-------------------------------------------------
DATE OF RESERVATION    TICKETING TO BE COMPLETED
FROM DEPARTURE DATE    WITHIN
-------------------    ---------------------
MORE THAN 121DAYS  -  90 DAYS
120-91 DAYS        -  60 DAYS
90- 60  DAYS       -  30 DAYS
59-30 DAYS         -  20 DAYS
29-15 DAYS         -  07 DAYS
14-08 DAYS         -  03 DAYS
07-04 DAYS         -  24 HOURS
03-02 DAYS         -  06 HOUR
01-00 DAYS         -  IMMEDIATE TICKETING
-----------------------------------------------
DUE TO AUTOMATED TICKETING DEADLINE CONTROL
DIFFERENCES COULD EXIST BETWEEN THE FARE RULE
LAST TICKETING DATE AND THE SYSTEM GENERATED
TICKETING DEADLINE MESSAGE.
THE MORE RESTRICTIVE TICKETING DEADLINE APPLIES
--------------------------------------------------
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION CODE-
RBD.
--------------------------------------------------
IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
--------------------------------------------------
IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR WY
RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING SECTORS.
NO MINIMUM STAY REQUIREMENTS APPLY.

TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN
12 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.
2 FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT.

4 TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH
DIRECTION.
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED
ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED WITH
NO RESTRICTIONS.
OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS
-TO FORM ROUND TRIPS.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER WY IN
RULE EU01/GB01 IN TARIFF
EUMERPV - BETWEEN EUROPE-THE MIDDLE EAST.
NO BLACKOUT DATES APPLY.

IF INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2.
THERE IS NO MISCELLANEOUS/OTHER SURCHARGE PER ANY
PASSENGER.
OTHERWISE - OUTBOUND -
WEEKEND SURCHARGE OF GBP 20.00 PER TICKET WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE PER ANY PASSENGER ON
FRI/SAT.
AND - INBOUND -
WEEKEND SURCHARGE OF GBP 20.00 PER TICKET WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE PER ANY PASSENGER ON
THU/FRI.
ACCOMPANIED TRAVEL NOT REQUIRED.
VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/BEFORE 31MAR17.

FARE RULE
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 150.00 FOR REFUND.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 70.00.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
--------------------------------------------------
FIRST CHANGE FREE OF CHARGE
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 150.00 FOR NO-SHOW.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
NO SHOW FEE MUST BE COLLECTED IN ADDITION TO
CHANGE /REFUND FEE.
-----------
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
GENERAL RULE - APPLY UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS PERMITTED.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
GENERAL RULES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
-------------------------------------------
A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE.
-------------------------------------------
IF REISSUE IS MADE AFTER SCHEDULED DEPARTURE TIME
OF CHANGED FLIGHT THEN THE NO-SHOW FEE WILL APPLY.
-------------------------------------------
// REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
PENALTY CHARGE WILL APPLY AS PER THE RULE.
INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
----------------------------------------------
ALL TAXES INCLUDING YQ/YR/Q SURCHARGE WILL BE
REFUNDED.
---------------------------
---------------------------
// NON REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
YQ/YR AND Q SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
GOVT TAXES WILL BE REFUNDED.
--------------------------------------
// PARTIALLY UTILIZED TICKETS  //
PARTIAL REFUND WILL APPLY ON SAME RBD OR NEXT
HIGHER VALUE. NO PENALTY CHARGE ON PARTIAL REFUND.
--------------------------
// IN CASE OF UPGRADE //
IF DATE AND FLIGHT IS NOT CHANGED - ONLY RBD IS
CHANGED THEN DATE CHANGE PENALTY WILL NOT BE
COLLECTED.
---------------------------------------
UPGRADE TO HIGHER CABIN. NO DATE CHANGE PENALTY
WILL APPLY.
--------------------------------------
REFUND RULE OR PENALTY MUST CARRY FORWARD AS PER
ORIGINAL TICKET.
--------------------------------------
IN CASE OF COMBINATION MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS
WILL APPLY.
--------------------------------------
// REFUND CHARGES WAIVED INCASE OF DEATH OF
PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER//
--------------------------------------------------
A COPY OF VALID DEATH CERTIFICATE ISSUED BY A
COMPETENT MEDICAL AUTHORITY IS REQUIRED.
FAMILY MEMBERS AS DEFINED IN WY CONDITIONS OF
CARRIAGE OR PASSENGER AIRLINE TARIFF RULE BOOK.
CONTACT WY OFFICE FOR WAIVERS DEFINED ABOVE.
--------------------------------------------------
NO HIP OR MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS APPLY.

THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED
- NON END - AND - VALID ON WY ONLY - IN THE
ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS ADULT.
--------------------------------------------------
OR - UNN/UNACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 5-11 - CHARGE 100
PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS ADULT.
--------------------------------------------------
OR - INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 20
PERCENT OF THE FARE.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS CHILD.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN INFANT REACHES 2YEARS OF AGE ON/BEFORE
DEPARTURE FROM POINT OF TURNAROUND A SEAT MUST BE
BOOKED ON THE RETURN LEG AND THE APPLICABLE CHILD
FARE CHARGED ON HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS WITH OUTBOUND
INFANT FARE.
OR - INS/INFANT WITH A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 75
PERCENT OF THE FARE.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS CHILD.
--------------------------------------------------

THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THROUGH FARE WITH A
DIFFERENTIAL AND/OR TO CALCULATE DIFFERENTIAL.
NOT APPLICABLE.
NO VOLUNTARY CHANGES DATA FOUND.
NO VOLUNTARY REFUNDS DATA FOUND.

NOTE - THE FOLLOWING TEXT IS INFORMATIONAL AND NOT

OTHER CONDITIONS
PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED.
NO ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS APPLY.
NO DAY/TIME TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS APPLY.

PERMITTED 09AUG16 THROUGH 09DEC16 OR 31DEC16 THROUGH
31MAR17 ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL SECTOR. SEASON IS
BASED ON DATE OF ORIGIN.

THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
WY FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999.
AND - OUTBOUND -
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN LON
AND MCT
THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
WY FLIGHT 104.
AND
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN MCT AND
MIDDLE EAST
THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY WY FLIGHT.
AND - INBOUND -
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY WY FLIGHT.

FARE RULE
CONFIRMED RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 DAYS AFTER
RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION
CODE -RBD-.
-----------------
IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
-------------------------
IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING
SECTORS.
--------------------------------
GENERAL RULE - APPLY UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
TICKETING DEADLINES BASED ON DATE OF RESERVATIONS
-------------------------------------------------
DATE OF RESERVATION    TICKETING TO BE COMPLETED
FROM DEPARTURE DATE    WITHIN
-------------------    ---------------------
MORE THAN 121DAYS  -  90 DAYS
120-91 DAYS        -  60 DAYS
90- 60  DAYS       -  30 DAYS
59-30 DAYS         -  20 DAYS
29-15 DAYS         -  07 DAYS
14-08 DAYS         -  03 DAYS
07-04 DAYS         -  24 HOURS
03-02 DAYS         -  06 HOUR
01-00 DAYS         -  IMMEDIATE TICKETING
-----------------------------------------------
DUE TO AUTOMATED TICKETING DEADLINE CONTROL
DIFFERENCES COULD EXIST BETWEEN THE FARE RULE
LAST TICKETING DATE AND THE SYSTEM GENERATED
TICKETING DEADLINE MESSAGE.
THE MORE RESTRICTIVE TICKETING DEADLINE APPLIES
--------------------------------------------------
WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION CODE-
RBD.
--------------------------------------------------
IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
--------------------------------------------------
IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR WY
RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING SECTORS.
NO MINIMUM STAY REQUIREMENTS APPLY.

TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN
3 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

1 FREE STOPOVER PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
1 INBOUND.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONE ADDITIONAL FREE STOPOVER CAN BE PERMITTED ON
OUTBOUND IF THE FARE IS HIGHER THAN
MCT LEVEL. IF FARE IS LESS THAN MCT LEVEL THE
FARE MUST BE RAISED TO MCT LEVEL TO HAVE A FREE
OUTBOUND STOPOVER

4 TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH
DIRECTION.
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED
ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED WITH
NO RESTRICTIONS.
OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS
-TO FORM ROUND TRIPS.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER WY IN
RULE EU01/GB01 IN TARIFF
EUMERPV - BETWEEN EUROPE-THE MIDDLE EAST.

OUTBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 13DEC THROUGH 30DEC.
INBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 28DEC THROUGH 11JAN OF THE
NEXT YEAR.

IF INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2.
THERE IS NO MISCELLANEOUS/OTHER SURCHARGE PER ANY
PASSENGER.
OTHERWISE
MISCELLANEOUS/OTHER SURCHARGE OF GBP 20.00 PER
TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE PER ANY
PASSENGER ON FRI/SAT.
ACCOMPANIED TRAVEL NOT REQUIRED.

VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 11AUG16 AND ON/
BEFORE 31MAR17.

FARE RULE
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 150.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 70.00.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
FIRST CHANGE FREE OF CHARGE.
-------------------------------
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 150.00 FOR NO-SHOW.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
NO SHOW FEE MUST BE COLLECTED IN ADDITION TO
CHANGE/REFUND FEE.
--------------
INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
GENERAL RULE - APPLY UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS PERMITTED.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
GENERAL RULES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
-------------------------------------------
A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE.
-------------------------------------------
IF REISSUE IS MADE AFTER SCHEDULED DEPARTURE TIME
OF CHANGED FLIGHT THEN THE NO-SHOW FEE WILL APPLY.
-------------------------------------------
// REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
PENALTY CHARGE WILL APPLY AS PER THE RULE.
INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
----------------------------------------------
ALL TAXES INCLUDING YQ/YR/Q SURCHARGE WILL BE
REFUNDED.
---------------------------
---------------------------
// NON REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
YQ/YR AND Q SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
GOVT TAXES WILL BE REFUNDED.
--------------------------------------
// PARTIALLY UTILIZED TICKETS  //
PARTIAL REFUND WILL APPLY ON SAME RBD OR NEXT
HIGHER VALUE. NO PENALTY CHARGE ON PARTIAL REFUND.
--------------------------
// IN CASE OF UPGRADE //
IF DATE AND FLIGHT IS NOT CHANGED - ONLY RBD IS
CHANGED THEN DATE CHANGE PENALTY WILL NOT BE
COLLECTED.
---------------------------------------
UPGRADE TO HIGHER CABIN. NO DATE CHANGE PENALTY
WILL APPLY.
--------------------------------------
REFUND RULE OR PENALTY MUST CARRY FORWARD AS PER
ORIGINAL TICKET.
--------------------------------------
IN CASE OF COMBINATION MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS
WILL APPLY.
--------------------------------------
// REFUND CHARGES WAIVED INCASE OF DEATH OF
PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER//
--------------------------------------------------
A COPY OF VALID DEATH CERTIFICATE ISSUED BY A
COMPETENT MEDICAL AUTHORITY IS REQUIRED.
FAMILY MEMBERS AS DEFINED IN WY CONDITIONS OF
CARRIAGE OR PASSENGER AIRLINE TARIFF RULE BOOK.
CONTACT WY OFFICE FOR WAIVERS DEFINED ABOVE.
--------------------------------------------------
NO HIP OR MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS APPLY.

THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED
- NON END - AND - VALID ON WY ONLY - IN THE
ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS ADULT.
--------------------------------------------------

TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.

ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS ADULT.
--------------------------------------------------
OR - INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 20
PERCENT OF THE FARE.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS CHILD.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN INFANT REACHES 2YEARS OF AGE ON/BEFORE
DEPARTURE FROM POINT OF TURNAROUND A SEAT MUST BE
BOOKED ON THE RETURN LEG AND THE APPLICABLE CHILD
FARE CHARGED ON HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS WITH OUTBOUND

OR - INS/INFANT WITH A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 75

MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME

NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
AS CHILD.
--------------------------------------------------

THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THROUGH FARE WITH A
